dcterms:creator: Ylva Ferstl
Rachel McDonnell
dcterms:description: The TSG dataset contains around four hours of full-body motion capture and speech audio from a male actor delivering spontaneous monologues, used for gesture generation.
dcterms:title: TSG (Trinity Speech Gesture Dataset)

dcterms:creator: Saeed Ghorbani
Ylva Ferstl
Daniel Holden
Nikolaus F. Troje
Marc-Andr√© Carbonneau
dcterms:description: ZeroEGGS is a gesture dataset consisting of two hours of speech and full-body motion capture of a female actor delivering monologues in 19 diverse styles, allowing for control over a range of style expressions.
dcterms:title: ZeroEGGS

dcterms:creator: Ian Mason
Sebastian Starke
Taku Komura
dcterms:description: The 100STYLE dataset contains high-quality 3D motion capture in 100 diverse styles of locomotion, used for training models to generate path-driven locomotion.
dcterms:title: 100STYLE

dcterms:creator: Ian Mason
Sebastian Starke
Taku Komura
dcterms:description: Dance MMA is a dataset that combines high-quality recordings of mixed martial arts movements, used for training models to generate fighting motions.
dcterms:title: Dance MMA
